frontmatter.name: Focusable element has no keyboard trap
frontmatter.description: This rule checks for keyboard traps. This includes use of both standard and non-standard keyboard navigation to navigate through all content without becoming trapped.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"80af7b","name":"Focusable element has no keyboard trap","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks for keyboard traps. This includes use of both standard and non-standard keyboard navigation to navigate through all content without becoming trapped.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:2.1.2":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"},"wcag-technique:G21":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["a1b64e","ebe86a"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Geir Sindre Fossøy","Dagfinn Rømen","Anne Thyme Nørregaard"]}}

frontmatter.name: Focusable element has no keyboard trap via non-standard navigation

frontmatter.name: Focusable element has no keyboard trap via standard navigation

frontmatter.name: `svg` element with explicit role has accessible name
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that each SVG image element that is explicitly included in the accessibility tree has an accessible name.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"7d6734","name":"`svg` element with explicit role has accessible name","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that each SVG image element that is explicitly included in the accessibility tree has an accessible name.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.1.1":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Bryn Anderson"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element auditory content has accessible alternative
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that `video` elements have an alternative for information conveyed through audio.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"eac66b","name":"`video` element auditory content has accessible alternative","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks that `video` elements have an alternative for information conveyed through audio.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.2.2":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["ab4d13","f51b46"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element auditory content has captions
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that captions are available for audio information in non-streaming `video` elements.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"f51b46","name":"`video` element auditory content has captions","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that captions are available for audio information in non-streaming `video` elements.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element content is media alternative for text
frontmatter.description: This rule checks non-streaming `video` is a media alternative for text on the page.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"ab4d13","name":"`video` element content is media alternative for text","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks non-streaming `video` is a media alternative for text on the page.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Language"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual content has accessible alternative
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that `video` elements with audio have an alternative for the video content as audio or as text.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"c5a4ea","name":"`video` element visual content has accessible alternative","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks that `video` elements with audio have an alternative for the video content as audio or as text.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.2.3":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["1ea59c","1a02b0","f196ce","ab4d13"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual content has audio description
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that non-streaming `video` elements have all visual information also contained in the audio.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"1ea59c","name":"`video` element visual content has audio description","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that non-streaming `video` elements have all visual information also contained in the audio.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output","Language"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual content has description track
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that description tracks that come with non-streaming `video` elements are descriptive.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"f196ce","name":"`video` element visual content has description track","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that description tracks that come with non-streaming `video` elements are descriptive.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output","Language"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual content has strict accessible alternative
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that `video` elements with audio have audio description.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"1ec09b","name":"`video` element visual content has strict accessible alternative","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks that `video` elements with audio have audio description.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.2.5":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["1ea59c","ab4d13","f196ce"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual content has transcript
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that non-streaming `video` elements have all audio and visual information available in a transcript.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"1a02b0","name":"`video` element visual content has transcript","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that non-streaming `video` elements have all audio and visual information available in a transcript.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.2.8":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output","Language"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]},"htmlHintIgnore":["tag-pair"]}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual-only content has accessible alternative
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that `video` elements without audio have an alternative available.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"c3232f","name":"`video` element visual-only content has accessible alternative","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks that `video` elements without audio have an alternative available.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.2.1":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["fd26cf","ac7dc6","ee13b5","d7ba54"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors","John Hicks","Rafal Charlampowicz"]},"htmlHintIgnore":["tag-pair"]}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual-only content has audio track alternative
frontmatter.description: Non-streaming `video` elements without audio must have an audio alternative.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"d7ba54","name":"`video` element visual-only content has audio track alternative","rule_type":"atomic","description":"Non-streaming `video` elements without audio must have an audio alternative.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output","Language"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual-only content has description track
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that description tracks that come with non-streaming `video` elements, without audio, are descriptive.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"ac7dc6","name":"`video` element visual-only content has description track","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that description tracks that come with non-streaming `video` elements, without audio, are descriptive.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output","Language"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual-only content has transcript
frontmatter.description: Non-streaming `video` elements without audio must have all visual information available in a transcript.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"ee13b5","name":"`video` element visual-only content has transcript","rule_type":"atomic","description":"Non-streaming `video` elements without audio must have all visual information available in a transcript.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output","Language"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]},"htmlHintIgnore":["tag-pair"]}

frontmatter.name: `video` element visual-only content is media alternative for text
frontmatter.description: This rule checks non-streaming silent `video` is a media alternative for text on the page.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"fd26cf","name":"`video` element visual-only content is media alternative for text","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks non-streaming silent `video` is a media alternative for text on the page.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Language"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}}

frontmatter.name: audio or video has no audio that plays automatically
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that automatically playing audio does not last for more than 3 seconds, or the audio has a control mechanism to stop or mute it.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"80f0bf","name":"audio or video has no audio that plays automatically","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks that automatically playing audio does not last for more than 3 seconds, or the audio has a control mechanism to stop or mute it.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.4.2":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["4c31df","aaa1bf"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Anne Thyme Nørregaard","Bryn Anderson"]},"htmlHintIgnore":["title-require"]}

frontmatter.name: audio or video that plays automatically does not exceed 3 seconds
frontmatter.description: content that plays automatically does not output audio for more than 3 seconds.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"aaa1bf","name":"audio or video that plays automatically does not exceed 3 seconds","rule_type":"atomic","description":"content that plays automatically does not output audio for more than 3 seconds.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag-technique:G60":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Anne Thyme Nørregaard","Bryn Anderson"]}}

frontmatter.name: audio or video that plays automatically has a control mechanism
frontmatter.description: audio or video that plays automatically must have a control mechanism.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"4c31df","name":"audio or video that plays automatically has a control mechanism","rule_type":"atomic","description":"audio or video that plays automatically must have a control mechanism.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag-technique:G170":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Anne Thyme Nørregaard","Bryn Anderson"]},"htmlHintIgnore":["title-require"]}

frontmatter.name: meta viewport does not prevent zoom
frontmatter.description: This rule checks that the `meta` element retains the user agent ability to zoom.

fields.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"b4f0c3","name":"meta viewport does not prevent zoom","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that the `meta` element retains the user agent ability to zoom.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.4.4":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Jey Nandakumar","Audrey Maniez"]}}

frontmatter.name: `aria-*` attribute is defined in WAI-ARIA
Element with `aria-hidden` has no focusable content
ARIA state or property is permitted
ARIA state or property has valid value
Attribute is not duplicated
`audio` element content is media alternative for text
`audio` element content has text alternative
`audio` element content has transcript
audio or video that plays automatically does not exceed 3 seconds
audio or video that plays automatically has a control mechanism
`autocomplete` attribute has valid value
Button has accessible name
Element within `body` has valid `lang` attribute
`svg` element with explicit role has accessible name
Focusable element has no keyboard trap
Focusable element has no keyboard trap via non-standard navigation
Focusable element has no keyboard trap via standard navigation
Form control has accessible name
Heading has accessible name
Heading is descriptive
HTML page has `lang` attribute
HTML page language is valid
HTML page `lang` and `xml:lang` attributes have matching values
HTML page has title
HTML page title is descriptive
`id` attribute value is unique
`iframe` element has accessible name
Image has accessible name
Image button has accessible name
Image filename is accessible name for image
Link has accessible name
`meta` element has no refresh delay
meta viewport does not prevent zoom
audio or video has no audio that plays automatically
`role` attribute has valid value
Element with `role` attribute has required states and properties
All table header cells have assigned data cells
`video` element auditory content has accessible alternative
`video` element visual content has accessible alternative
`video` element content is media alternative for text
`video` element visual content has audio description
`video` element auditory content has captions
`video` element visual content has description track
`video` element visual-only content has accessible alternative
`video` element visual-only content is media alternative for text
`video` element visual-only content has audio track alternative
`video` element visual-only content has description track
`video` element visual-only content has transcript
`video` element visual content has strict accessible alternative
`video` element visual content has transcript
Visible label is part of accessible name
ARIA required context role
ARIA required owned elements
Orientation of the page is not restricted using CSS transform property
Link in context is descriptive
Form control label is descriptive
Links with identical accessible names have equivalent purpose
Text has minimum contrast
`iframe` elements with identical accessible names have equivalent purpose
